presentation.description: Memory is a classic card game that stimulates your memory and concentration. Test your abilities by finding all matching pairs of cards!
presentation.rule1: Flip two cards on each turn
presentation.rule2: If the cards match, they stay visible
presentation.rule3: Otherwise, they flip back and you must remember their position
presentation.rule4: Find all pairs in minimum moves
presentation.feature3: Move counter to track your performance
